settings.heading: Learn The Secrets To Growing STRONG Seedlings Every Time!

settings.text: Growing from seed can feel overwhelming, but Lisa’s expert seed starting methods, perfected over 25+ years of flower farming, ensure healthier root systems, and increased plant vigor. This 1.5 hour course will help anyone confidently start from seed.

settings.custom_html:
• Boost Germination Rates

    Detailed video lessons provide step-by-step instruction

  • Grow Thriving Transplants

    Learn to nurture seedlings indoors and how to plant them in the garden

  • Gain Confidence

    These 4 lessons will take you from novice to pro in under 2 hours

  • Budget-Friendly Ideas

    Learn how to invest in low-cost tools with high yields

• Pioneering Urban Flower Farmer

    Lisa brings over 25 years of expertise in urban flower farming, sharing invaluable knowledge with gardeners and flower farmers alike through her innovative practices and techniques.

  • Accomplished Business Owner

    As the founder of The Gardener’s Workshop, Lisa offers comprehensive online courses and curates a selection of seeds, tools, and supplies favored on her farm.

  • Esteemed Author

    Lisa has penned three influential books on flower cultivation, including her latest work, The Cut Flower Handbook.

  • Influential National Speaker

    A sought-after presenter at national conferences, Lisa inspires the next generation of flower growers with her expert methods and passionate philosophy.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 1 (24 mins)
settings.title: Learning What a Seed Needs
settings.text: Lisa sets the ground rules for depth, moisture level, & temperature for great germination.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 2 (25 mins)
settings.title: Planting Seeds Outdoors
settings.text: Tips to turn your dirt into lush soil perfect for seed sowing outdoors.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 3 (51 mins)
settings.title: Starting Seeds Indoors
settings.text: Learn how to make & maintain soil blocks along with which size blocker to use.

settings.subtitle: Lesson 4 (16 mins)
settings.title: Seed Starting Tips
settings.text: Check out Lisa’s recommended budget-friendly home seed starting setup.

settings.title: What is the difference between School courses and Workshops?
settings.content:
Workshops vary from sixty minutes to over four hours of instruction, see individual courses for details. Each of these courses offer lots of valuable information on a specific topic that you can digest in a short amount of time and put into action right away.

School course content is much more comprehensive and covers broad topics. School courses are meant to serve as a long-term reference tool that you will use all throughout the course of your flower farming journey. Each course includes 6 modules, which each contain multiple video training sessions, instructor worksheets, and handouts, and an FAQ archive. All of the course sessions (including the FAQs) are searchable by keyword, so you can always find and go directly to the information that you need at any given time.

settings.title: May I watch more than once?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have unlimited access?
settings.content: You have lifetime unlimited access to your purchased courses.

settings.title: Do I have to watch at a certain time?
settings.content: You can watch the courses anytime at your convenience. Purchased On-Demand Courses will appear in your library immediately and will always be there for viewing.

settings.title: Do you offer course discounts?
settings.content: Yes, once you are part of our course family (owning any online school or workshop) you will be eligible for $50 off additional school courses.

settings.title: I live outside of the USA, may I purchase a course?
settings.content: Yes, our online courses are available internationally.

settings.title: Are the courses focused on growing in a specific region or area?
settings.content: No, the courses are based on methods to apply to any growing area.
